item.title: PreRelease: Open ICAO 24 Database
item.description: I’ve long been a fan of aviation. When sites like FlightAware came out, I was a huge fan toÂ learn about the contrails around me. I was even more excited when the revolution in RTLSDR enabled everyone to track ADS-B enabled aircraft for $10. Sometimes outside on a run or drive, I’d see a high altitude contrail do a 180 and wonder, what just happened? In 1998, short of calling the FAA, you’d never know.
